steps.displayName: Write DataFrame to a Kafka Topic Using Key Field
steps.description: This step will write a DataFrame to a Kafka Topic using the value in the keyField for each row as the key

params.name: dataFrame
params.description: The DataFrame to post to the Kakfa topic

params.name: keyField
params.description: The column name to use to get the key value

params.name: separator
params.description: The separator character to use when combining the column data

steps.displayName: Write DataFrame to a Kafka Topic Using static key
steps.description: This step will write a DataFrame to a Kafka Topic using the provided key

params.name: dataFrame
params.description: The DataFrame to post to the Kakfa topic

params.name: separator
params.description: The separator character to use when combining the column data

steps.displayName: Write a single message to a Kafka Topic Using static key
steps.description: This step will write a simgle message to a Kafka Topic using the provided key

params.name: message
params.description: The message to post to the Kakfa topic
